roleset.name: to make a screeching noise
roleset.note: SQUEAK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'squeak' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from squeak.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [*]-1 Stretching his arms in his silky white shirt and squeaking his black shoes , he-1 lectures a visitor about the way [0][*] to sell American real estate [*T*-1] and boasts about his friendship with Margaret Thatcher 's son .

roleset.name: struggle to reach an end/goal
roleset.note: SQUEAK-V NOTES: Predicate added by Arrick (from squeak.02-v)

example.text: ...this candidate that that-1 *T*-1 barely squeaked through this election when George Bush carried that district two to one and the former congressman carried it almost three to one...
example.arg: when George Bush carried that disctrict two to one and the former congressman carried it almost three to one
